alert.note: Alert for North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 3:01PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS PRODUCING HEAVY RAIN ARE POSSIBLE ACROSS THE BOUNDARY WATERS CANOE AREA WILDERNESS TODAY AND TONIGHT... Multiple rounds of thunderstorms capable of producing heavy rain will be possible this afternoon and tonight across the Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness. The main impacts from the storms will be frequent cloud-to-ground lightning and locally heavy rainfall, which may lead to localized flooding of creeks, streams, and low-lying areas. Campers should take extra precautions in order to secure campsites in case of heavy rainfall. Check campsites for possible hazards such as low spots where water can pool. Move tents away from creeks and rivers in case of flash flooding. Monitor NOAA Weather Radio for updates and possible warnings...

area.areaDesc: North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake
